title: 9/29/21: Pelosi Betrayal, Generals Under Fire, Federal Reserve Corruption, Harvard Mania, R Kelly, Mint the Coin, Ken Griffin, Rhode Island Politics, and More!

itunes:title: 9/29/21: Pelosi Betrayal, Generals Under Fire, Federal Reserve Corruption, Harvard Mania, R Kelly, Mint the Coin, Ken Griffin, Rhode Island Politics, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar discuss the congressional battles within the Democratic party, top Generals testifying in front of congress, corruption in the federal reserve, mania at Harvard, singer R. Kelly's conviction, the case for mint the coin, wall street corruption against redditors, Rhode Island's political revolution, and more!
